D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000100
50000074 01000001
20000075 00000001

D0000000 00000000
50000044 01000001
20000045 00000001
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
{Game runs at 60FPS by default.
Hold R for 30FPS (useful for giant battles/credits).
Based on codes by @Shay}

[++FPS++]

[60FPS v1.2]

50000044 01000101
20000045 00000000
D0000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Sets FPS to 60.
Based on codes by @Shay}

[Default 30FPS v1.2]
D3000000 30000000
50000074 01000001
20000075 00000001
D0000000 00000000
520DA3AC 01000001
220DA3AD 00000001
D0000000 00000000
50000064 01000001
20000065 01000001
D0000000 00000000
50000044 01000001
20000045 00000001
D0000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Restores default 30FPS.
Based on codes by @Shay}
